description: UPDATE TO 6.1.1
Its the best desktop environment(if you don't care about resource usage, like me). Its many times more efficient than gnome and a hundred times more configurable.
Using Plasma 6 is a great experience!

- Highly configurable
- Looks nice
- Easy to use out of the box

I'm still setting things up months later. lol. But, I tend to tinker with things.

KDE has come a long way since 3.5! However, if you're interested in something like that then check out Trinity (TDE). Alternatively, if you want a more lightweight, slightly simpler QT based desktop environment then try LXQt.
Fantastic customisation, really best of Win and Gnome, giving you full control of the way you like you OS to look like.
I love KDE! Keep up the great work!
Highly customizable, high performance, low memory usage, and good looking

Gone are the days when you had to choose between low resource consumption and plentiful features, or between beauty and functionality. With Plasma, you can have all four!

Plasma gets better all the time and has an agressive release schedule, so people using rolling release distros can have continual improvements quickly.
The best Linux DE
If you have the horse power, it's the best looking version of a Linux GUI.

English;
High personalization,
Looks nice,
Easy to use,
Easy to get used to,
The KDE community and its developers are great people

Türkçe;
Yüksek kişiselleştirme,
Güzel görünüyor,
Kullanımı kolay,
Alışması kolay,
KDE topluluğu ve geliştiricileri harika insanlar.

I cannot express by how much impressed I am! I just want to say THANK YOU PLASMA DEVS!!!!! KDE apps developers are doing a GREAT JOB TOO! They are so integrated that I often forget they aren't a part of Plasma itself! THANKS!
It's highly configurable, plays well with apps, and easily configured to run lean and laptop battery friendly.
IMO the most advanced, yet intuitive Desktop environment, together with the KDE applications I think it's light-years ahead of the friendly competition.

I tried various iterations of Ubuntu(unity/gnome) and Manjaro(KDE) over years past, and honestly with Neon and KDE 5.19 I feel like this the first time I can actually stick with linux full time and not miss anything about windows. Seriously, fantastic job.
summary: The only viable DE for both the masses + power users

description: I think KDE Plasma is the perfect desktop environment for Arch Linux. Just like Arch, it's powerful, highly customizable, and fast.
It is truely amazing and customisable. But debian users are still stuck with 17 when 20 is out for a month. Why so favour to gnome???
summary: One of the best DE. Unsung by mainstream debian

description: It's amazing, easy and powerful DE. It can do everything well and fast. Thanks KDE Community!
summary: The best De in the whole world

description: This is absolutely the best distro in the world! It is fast (extremely fast), lightweight and customizable!
I used to use KDE Manjaro but as I switched to PopOS, GNOME never felt right, and with KDE I feel home, KDE makes everything just the way I want it, and if something is lacking, I can change it!
summary: I love it, never going back!

description: Great for customizing if you want to sink your teeth into it, but also works great as a stable standalone desktop interface with enough bells and whistles to keep everything working but also never stop finding cool tricks.
Fast, efficient, customizable and user friendly. And pretty. Very happy
I have preferred this desktop environment since 2008. And every year it gets better, faster and more beautiful!

This is the most complete and polished desktop I've ever used and there's not many I haven't. The environment feels like somebody heard all those "why didn't they just..." thoughts while you were using other desktops and built one from the ground up without the BS. Plasma is fresh and elegant right out of the box but it's also a tweakers paradise if you want it to be. That being said, unlike other Linux based GUIs I've used I don't feel like I need to sift through settings and browse the forums looking for mods to try and patch up holes. That's because somebody cared when they built Plasma. I came from a sloppy experience with Xfce and it's myriad of pinned together toolkits and themes that dress the framework like an old tarp draped over a mass grave. After getting fustrated navigating a sea of comprimise and picking apart CSS and PNG assets that look like they didn't make the cut for the Windows95 launch, I decided to pull the plug on GTK dependency. I don't know why I hadn't used KDE before but Plasma has literally made me smile with surprise more than once. Enough rambling. Get Plasma. NOW!
By far this is the best Desktop I have ever used. SUPER SONIC fast and you can do almost anything with it. I mean anything ;)

Out of all the desktops I've tried, Plasma is by far my favorite. The attention to detail is unsurpassed and coupled with the amount of customization it offers... it's nearly impossible to go back to any other DE. It's snappy, clean, easy to use and memory consumption is impressively low. Bravo KDE team.
So feature rich, customizable and above all SO CLEVER. All KDE apps have that one function you, as a user, always think of but no developer apparently could. But KDE ones actuall can.

Amazing customisation, I've made my DE work for me and work to its very best. However, it doesn't feel stable and polished as much as it should. Changing settings sometimes frezzes my device, forcing me to hard reboot. Wiget placement scrambles it self sometimes and becomes a chore to reorganise. The DE just randomly breaks completly, sometimes it frezzes whenever I try and log in after being a away from my computer for a while. Also, other than here. No real easy and convient way to provide feedback to the devs and highlight issues. A feedback app would be nice. And some of these issues not being fixed for months now have left me frustrated. They even reappear when I try this DE on other devices.
KDE has come a long wany in improving the stability and flexibility.
Best desktop environment on all linux distro, good functionality and easy to use, i kept this desktop for daily use
I have been using KDE from the start and I have never looked back!

Simple and gets the job done

Alt + Spacebar omni bar function helped me a lots and don't get me started on customization. 

My plasma desktop have an apearance of Aero and I like it a lot.

Wayland implementation is still work on progress and riddled with visual glitches, I hope it will finish soon
Easy to use and reliable

Easily the best desktop environment, since its competitors obviously cannot put up much of a fight against this decently featureful DE. It still has way too many bugs and glitches, especially with Wayland, and it's quite bloated, although its resource usage is not bad compared to GNOME. If you want a DE, this is the one! It shouldn't be this easy of a choice, but the alternatives suck too much.
easier to use than ms windows
summary: it is very customizable and easy to use

description: I love it, easy, pretty, flexable and powerfull.
summary: It is a reason to use Linux

description: All time fav! Love latest KDE over Gnome DE
It is awesome.
doesnt need much time to get used to its function

I'm amazed with how customisable it is, no extensions *cough cough gnome cough* needed for anything. Also, blur is a must for me so having it preconfigured and ready to go is awesome. My desktop is set up to resemble macOS/elementaryOS and it works great. Thank you KDE!
The best looking desktop environment out there! Get the feel of the dashboard... And there's plenty of good looking packs to custom EverYthing! KUDOS Plasma KDE!
I love KDE Desktop! It's so beautiful, stylish and pro made. It's like Windows 7 but many times better. Love all the interface!

I love KDE.
I love the options and choices given by KDE.

On my linux mint 20.2, i've installed cinnamon and mate. Cinnamon is good (vote=8), Mate quite good (7), but Plasma is exceptional, a world ahead! 
And it's perfect out of the box!
It was years that i continued to use gnome, because we have used linux every days on server side, and and I hadn't noticed difference. But now that i started to use linux as client, the difference is big in favor of KDE Plasma. Even it's ok on default settings, there are so many configuration! And WOW, the accompanying programs are great too!

Gnome and derivate are quite good, but KDE Plasma is quite Perfect!

Thanks all
i use debian and it works perfectly, it is very good
Like it very much, looks very nivce and runs smoothly.
summary: The best DE I've used so far

description: Modern looking, sleek, highly configurable yet not taxing on resources. Probably the best desktop environment there ever will be.
Does everything I could want, in the best way possible
Good Desktop Enviroment. Solid design, modern and sleek UI. Love it.
best. just best.
I've used Linux so long and experiencing the KDE experience in Kubuntu has made the most beautiul experience ever I used.
This is the BEST DESKTOP ENVIRONMENT I HAVE EVER USED!

My favorite desktop environment.
I'm a huge fan of this!
It's great! It also works a lot like Windows, so I feel right at home using it.
It's the best de ever I tried! it's so beautiful and customizable. and also has good animations!
summary: The Best DE ever i tried

description: Made with love and excellent taste. Definitely the leader in performance, look, integration and customization. Should show the highest stability with Debian-based/derivative distros.

Plasma is by far the best DE I've ever tried. It doesn't matter the which distro I install, I make sure it has KDE Plasma. KDE is amazing with a lot of software like Kdenlive, Krita, KMail, Kalendar, Choqok, Calligra, Dolphin, Discover, etc... KDE's set of software are by far better than the offerings from other DEs.
Its just the best.
you're required to register just to submit a bug report.. /facepalm and there's this "Baloo File Extractor Closed Unexpectedly" going for atleast 3 years now that still hasn't been fixed
summary: Annoying Bug That Wont Go Away

description: i cant wait to get 5.25 im using kde on mint and its so cool
KDE Does brilliantly. my suggestion is they work on the KMail and Kontact apps it was terrible in Gnome but its understood now.
Super easy to use, most customizable, it's like a breath of fresh air, I love it

This is fast, well performed and well designed DE which I hope oneday will be default in Debian. The ability to disable menus in Qt-apps and make UI minimalistic made my desktop very comfortable to use. It has cool customizing features for people who are really do job on Linux Desktop system. The best DE in Linux I ever used.
The Plasma desktop used to be one I shied away from in favor of xfce or cinnamon, but now that I've used it for a few days I'm really enjoying the customization options and sane defaults.
This is one of the reasons I actually wanted to migrate from Windows to Linux.
summary: A reason to switch to Linux

description:
Have been using KDE Desktops for almost 2 decades now. Best Desktop there is i.m.h.o.

::wq

Login screen freezes quite often. In this case I have to press Alt+F4 to a start the shell and then enter "sudo systemctl restart sddm.service" to restart the login-screen.

Sometimes the title bars of windows are missing. It is then impossible to move or close the windows.

When programs open the window temporarily contains the content of other applications until the program is fully loaded.

The only DE that has an option of shuting down after a period of inactivity .... ( buitl in not with 3rd party programs ). In my opinion KDE Partition manager is better than GParted. KONQUEROR - don't know if developers observed BUT some of distros have disabled it ..... When you have already Dolphin and Firefox WHY / WHO needs Konqueror ? But if you wat to uninstall from Discover ( Software Center ) .... realize that is so connected with the whole KDE .... Isn't it the same "forced to " situation like Internet Explorer on Windows before ?

Adding apps to taskbar, panel are lost after restarting plasma, which is almost unworkable and certainly unacceptable !
Favorites remembers it's apps, but adds the deleted default apps back after restating plasma. Also very annoying!

KDE Plasma is the best Desktop Environment to my opinion, but gets released with a lot of bug due to lack of testing. If the builders would test what they release then these bugs would have been noticed and dealt with before releasing.

Operating System: Debian GNU/Linux 11
KDE Plasma Version: 5.20.5
KDE Frameworks Version: 5.78.0
Qt Version: 5.15.2
Kernel Version: 5.10.110-rockchip-rk3588
OS Type: 64-bit
Processors: 8 × 
Memory: 15.4 GiB of RAM
Graphics Processor: llvmpipe

How come there is such a lack of testing on releases ?
Testing is not about glancing at the desktop but thouroughly testing all it's functions !
but, uh, let me honest with, you, i prefer Cinnamon, heck yeah, i am a member of the cinnamon gang, god bless Cinnamon.

KDE is more stable than GNOME
KDE looks better than Cinnamon
KDE supports Wayland
KDE supports Wayland
KDE supports Wayland use it
summary: KDE is WAYY better than GNOME and Cinnamon

description:
I got a RPI 5 for christmas and installed ubuntu on it. And i thought I 
would try to install KDE Plasma onto ubuntu. It runs amazing and now I
have so many apps to use.
i like it! ??
Mein Daily Driver für die Arbeit, super produktivitätsunterstützer!
Die beste Arbeitsfläche! Super!
Works very well!
Ojala se pudieran arreglar todos los errores de rendimiento que tiene
summary: De los escritorios mas robustos y personalizables del mundo GNU

description: falta afinar,seria fantastico,                   saludos a los desarrolladores
Lo estado probando hace tiempo y creo que si no es el mejor pronto lo sera. Sigan asi y Gracias por su aporte
Mi entorno de escritorio favorito desde hace dos años, me encanta el enfoque que maneja y la posibilidad de perzonalizar todo a mi gusto, muchsa gracias muy buen trabajo.

Es el entorno de escritorio mas completo que he probado (Y los he probado casi todos) pero su mayor defecto es la incompatibilidad con las tarjetas gráficas NVidia al ejecutar programas o funciones propas del entorno que requieran OpenGl, es verdad que mi tarjeta es un poco viejita (NVidia GTS 450) pero en otros entornos no tuve el mas minimo problema, sin emargo en KDE para lograr tener efectos estéticos como transparencias animacions y difuminado de ventanas el sistema KWin crashea constantemente, es una verdadera pena (probé con el controlador libre y con el privativo y con ambos es lo mismo)
Instale en el año 2020 fedora pero con gnome, me parece que esta version con KDE es una joya! increible.
simplemente perfecto

Me parece un escritorio fantastico, de lo mejor y fuera de matrix que es lo maximo, ser libre es el camino ,PERO... mi escritorio no se queda en su sitio casi nunca, se lia con las pantallas.PD. la suspension del sistema no le sienta muy bien, unas veces si otras no,  ---- KDE FOREVER----

J’ai d’abord commencé avec l’interface graphique de Gnome, mais j’avais tout le temps l’impression qu’il était soit pas fini, soit trop simplifier en comparaison de Windows.

Maintenant je suis sur Manjaro Linux avec le bureau KDE, il prend moins de RAM que gnome, tout en ayant beaucoup plus de fonctionnalité que Windows. Je l’ai configuré pour qu’il ressemble comme deux gouttes d’eau à Mac OS. Les effets de bureau (cosmétiques) sont meilleurs que ceux de Windows, et ils égalent (voire parfois dépasse) ceux de Mac OS,

En revanche certaines distributions intègrent mal KDE, ce qui peut causer des bugs. Heureusement ce n’est pas le cas de Manjaro.

Bref, si vous voulez un système simple sans distraction POSSIBLE, prenez gnome, mais si comme moi vous ne voulez pas vous sentir limité, prenez KDE. De base il est assez dépouiller, mais peut être puissant si vous le voulez. ?
summary: Plus puissant que Windows, plus leger que gnome, aussi beau que Mac OS

description:
Depuis des années sur KDE malgrès avoir essayer gnome et autres je reste accros a KDE.
Essayé sur Kubuntu et debian KDE il est plus complet sur debian.

With each new update, the desktops get better and better. Keep up the good work, we believe in you=) 
P.S. Sorry for my english
Отлично, но бывает процесс умирает
Интерфейс легко настраивается, потребление памяти приемлемое.
По моему мнению это - самое лучшее и самое красивое окружение рабочего стола.
Классика в мире рабочих столов. Всё прекрасно работает и настраивается.

Я от Виндовса ушел, а он от меня нет ))
Что поделаеш - привычка.
Ранние версии мне не нравились, а пятая плазма совсем другое дело. Надеюсь на развитие проекта
Самое продуманное окружение рабочего стола. На втором месте - pantheon/elementary

В своё время отказался от KDE с выходом KDE 4. Перешёл на Gnome 2, который испортили ещё хуже. Долгое время был приверженцем XFCE. Недавно решил попробовать KDE 5.20. Оказалось за много лет всё стало хорошо. Иногда падают панели при настройке, но это нужно делать только при их первоначальной настройке. В целом KDE 5 работает стабильно. По скорости работы по сравнению с XFCE 4.16 на глаз особой разницы не видно, скорее наоборот, анимации дефолтные помогают понять, что приложение запустилось и скоро появится. В XFCE приходилось просто ждать результата. Ну и если все свистелки отключить, работает просто реактивно.
классно, много настроек да и сам рабочий стол красивый
Идеально, просто идеально
可配置性最好的桌面，就是开机这块等的时间比较久
My favorite desktop environment ever!
KDE Plasma 6,Yes!
啥也不说了，强大的定制性可以让人想干嘛就干嘛
